interface.name: KeySelectorResult
interface.javadoc:
The result returned by the {@link KeySelector#select KeySelector.select}method.

At a minimum, a KeySelectorResult contains the Key selected by the KeySelector. Implementations of this interface may add methods to return implementation or algorithm specific information, such as a chain of certificates or debugging information. Sean Mullan JSR 105 Expert Group 1.6 KeySelector

Returns the selected key.
the selected key, or null if none can be found
